item.title: Installation Guide
item.description: Installation The recommended way to get started using the Node.js 2.0 driver is by using NPM (Node Package Manager) to install the dependency in your project. MongoDB Driver After you’ve created your project with npm init, you can install the MongoDB driver and its dependencies with the command: npm install mongodb --save This will download the MongoDB driver and add a dependency entry in your package.json file.
